A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Still surprised audience score doesn't drop\, seems to be locked in place. It's a terrible movie\, avoid at all cost. It should be banned from the canon\, it does not deserve to have \"Star Wars\" in the title. CGI may be fine\, but the plot is the most ridiculous ever. It is NOT possible to go to lightspeed in normal space and plough into another ship. Else lightspeed would be impossible at all anyway. Any form of debris would be lethal. Lightspeed is only possible when going into a 4th dimension\, warped space etc.
